feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX][Network] - background infrastructure operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 20, 04:00 - 08:00 UTC

Feb 23, 03:55 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Network Infrastructure.

Start time : 20/03/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 20/03/2024 08:00 UTC
Service impact : Network automation will be paused for about 30 min during the maintenance
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for the management of the background infrastructure.

entry.title: [Worldwide][Dedicated Servers] - APIv6 BringYourOwnImage routes operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 19, 09:30 - 09:45 UTC

Feb 14, 00:54 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

Start time : 19/03/2024 09:30 UTC
End time : 19/03/2024 09:45 UTC
Service impact : Some API calls definitely removed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, this maintenance will enables customers to deploy cloudready images directly on their dedicated server.

The following API calls will be definitely removed:

GET /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/bringYourOwnImage

POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/bringYourOwnImage

DELETE /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/bringYourOwnImage

Customers can still use the Bring Your Own Image (BYOI) feature from the API call POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start. More details can be found in the documentation page.
This change was required in order to add the new Bring Your Own Linux (BYOLinux) feature.
Bring Your Own Image (BYOI) / Bring Your Own Linux (BYOLinux), a comparison sheet - OVHcloud.

entry.title: [Worldwide][Dedicated Servers] - IPXE scripts migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 5, 09:00 - 09:45 UTC

Feb 6, 23:27 UTC
Scheduled - Start time :05/03/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 05/03/2024 09:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy about IPXE (open-source implementation of the Preboot eXecution Environment), the following API calls will be definitely removed:
POST /me/ipxeScript
PUT /me/ipxeScript/{name}
Customers can still use that feature by using the "bootScript" key within the PUT /dedicated/server/{serviceName} API call: see documentation for more details.

entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Boot Firmware Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 26, 10:00 - 10:59 UTC

Feb 20, 16:41 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

Start time : 26/02/2024 10:00 UTC
End time : 26/02/2024 10:59 UTC
Service impact : This maintenance affect reboots to disk or in rescue mode for servers running very old hardware
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, we will be changing the boot firmware of legacy boot servers in RBX2 from SYSLINUX to iPXE.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 45B26
entry.content:
Feb 24, 02:37 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 24/02/2024 00:25 UTC
End time : 24/02/2024 02:34 UTC
Root cause : Hardware issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 24, 02:34 UTC
Identified - Start time : 24/02/2024 00:25 UTC
Service impact : The network in rack 45B26 is no longer responding.
Root cause : Hardware issue.
Ongoing actions : The replacement of the affected equipment is now completed, our team are working on the last checks.

Feb 24, 01:14 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 24, 01:12 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/02/2024 00:25 UTC
Service impact : The network in rack 45B26 is no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
